title: Manage a Tenant Improvement (TI) Project
description: A new office tenant receives a TI allowance to build out their space. The property manager must oversee the project.

tasks.description: Review the lease to confirm the TI allowance amount and any landlord responsibilities.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the scope and budget of the TI project.

tasks.description: Review the tenant's construction plans to ensure they comply with building rules and regulations.
Track the project's progress and process disbursement requests from the TI allowance for completed work.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent manages the financial aspects of the build-out correctly.
